%load_ext autoreload
%autoreload 2

get_dome_positions[source]

get_dome_positions(mode='cartesian')

Generates positions of all LEDs of the dome. Position of first and last LED of each stripe was estimated in Blender, and other LEDs position are interpolated.

mode: ["cartesian", "spherical"]

as_cartesian[source]

as_cartesian(rthetaphi)

as_spherical[source]

as_spherical(xyz)

get_dome_positions(mode="spherical")
